text: @jaketapper Stop. Just stop. You need to focus. This is number 1 enemy Covid19. Trump is just the age who will die from it. The thing we have to do is get MASKS for ALL Americans. And see what the plans are for quarantining towns and cities. They have plans find out what they are and report!
